FuncDef: The display loop-detect trigger trigger-down all command displays the information about all the interfaces in the Trigger Down state.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After proactive loop detection upon interface Up is configured, all the interfaces in the Trigger Down state including the interface name, VLAN ID/VSI, and time period can be displayed. To check information about all the interfaces, run the display loop-detect trigger trigger-down all command.
